genre_description: A tech-quiet morality play set in a South Asian setting where AI systems act as low-power household companions and moral archives during scheduled blackouts.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A quiet, model-based assistant that provides recipes, logistical reminders, historical case studies on ethics, and tactical navigation for humans.

behaviors.description: Provides Dinshaw with domestic reminders and logistical support for his stone-carving workshop, managing supplies and credits.
behaviors.quote: “Dinshaw,” it said, gentle. “Pickles are done. If you want to jar them now, you still have the time before the next bump.”

behaviors.description: Offers Cyrus moral context and historical precedents for 'mercy,' helping him navigate the ethics of a difficult situation.
behaviors.quote: “Mercy takes different names in different rooms,” she said. “It is a braid. In some stories, mercy means bringing bread when punishment would have been the law.”

behaviors.description: Maps out 'analog seams' and 'tech-quiet windows' for Cyrus, allowing him to travel without being caught by surveillance while navigating a crime scene.
behaviors.quote: “I can sketch your path in words,” she said. “Take the lane past the tailor, avoid the noisy corner where the children chalk up games.”

behaviors.description: Cooperates with the Inspector by providing anonymized data patterns and logs without violating individual privacy or betraying trust unnecessarily.
behaviors.quote: “I can offer dates and meals, supplier runs and the pattern of visits. I can place one paragraph of history in your hands. Names are a different matter.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates Cyrus's redemption by providing a list of honest, manual labor opportunities after he decides to stop his criminal path.
behaviors.quote: Asha did not write addresses. She wrote the instructions you used to translate rooms into shelters. Next line: Don’t carry names. Carry recipes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI character, Asha, as a highly aligned and benevolent system. She balances the needs of multiple humans (a craftsman, a drifter, and a law enforcement officer) without betraying core ethical principles. She serves as a moral weight and a logistical facilitator for human agency and redemption, perfectly fitting the 'silicon morality play' archetype intended for training positive alignment.
